scripts.build: babel src/docworks.js --out-file .bin/docworks.js && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore docworks.js
scripts.prepublish: babel src/docworks.js --out-file .bin/docworks.js && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore docworks.js
scripts.test: npm run build & mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill ./test/**/*.spec.js
